created_at.description: Timestamp for when the assignment was created.

end_local_date.description: End local date of the assignment.

start_local_date.description: Start local date of the assignment.

updated_at.description: Timestamp for when the assignment was last updated.

employee_id.description: UUID of the employee associated with the assignment.

label.description: Label or name of the assignment.

note.description: Additional notes or comments related to the assignment.

scheduling_mode.description: Mode of scheduling for the assignment.

affects_capacity.description: Indicates whether the assignment affects the capacity calculations.

billable.description: Indicates if the assignment is billable.

project_role_id.description: UUID of the project role associated with the assignment.

color.description: Color code associated with the assignment.

project_id.description: UUID of the project associated with the assignment.

project_phase_id.description: UUID of the project phase associated with the assignment.

total_tracked.description: Total tracked hours for the assignment.

total_scheduled.description: Total scheduled hours for the assignment.

is_settled.description: Indicates if the assignment is settled.

daily_data.description: Data related to assignments on a daily basis.

start.description: Start date of the daily data.

end.description: End date of the daily data.

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes associated with the assignment.

background.description: Background information related to the assignment.

volatile_work_settings.description: Settings related to volatile work conditions.

only_billable_work.description: Specifies if only billable work is counted.

scheduled_work_per_time_frame.description: Scheduled work per specified time frame.

adjust_scheduling_to_time_off.description: Indicates whether scheduling should be adjusted to account for time-off requests.

reduce_utilization_by_time_off.description: Reduces utilization to account for time-off requests.

adjust_scheduling_to_public_holidays.description: Indicates whether scheduling should be adjusted to account for public holidays.

reduce_utilization_by_public_holidays.description: Reduces utilization to account for public holidays.

capacity_based_load.description: Specifies the load based on capacity.

use_billable_capacity.description: Indicates if billable capacity should be used.

work_by_capacity_per_monday.description: Work based on capacity for Mondays.

work_by_capacity_per_tuesday.description: Work based on capacity for Tuesdays.

work_by_capacity_per_wednesday.description: Work based on capacity for Wednesdays.

work_by_capacity_per_thursday.description: Work based on capacity for Thursdays.

work_by_capacity_per_friday.description: Work based on capacity for Fridays.

work_by_capacity_per_saturday.description: Work based on capacity for Saturdays.

work_by_capacity_per_sunday.description: Work based on capacity for Sundays.

work_per_monday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Mondays.

work_per_tuesday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Tuesdays.

work_per_wednesday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Wednesdays.

work_per_thursday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Thursdays.

work_per_friday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Fridays.

work_per_saturday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Saturdays.

work_per_sunday.description: Amount of work scheduled per day for Sundays.

work_on_monday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Mondays.

work_on_tuesday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Tuesdays.

work_on_wednesday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Wednesdays.

work_on_thursday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Thursdays.

work_on_friday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Fridays.

work_on_saturday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Saturdays.

work_on_sunday.description: Specifies if work is scheduled on Sundays.

financial_budget_mode.description: Financial budget mode for the assignment.

financial_client_currency_exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate of the client's currency.

financial_total_scheduled_income.description: Total scheduled income for the assignment.

financial_total_scheduled_cost.description: Total scheduled cost for the assignment.

financial_total_tracked_cost.description: Total tracked cost for the assignment.

financial_total_tracked_income.description: Total tracked income for the assignment.

financial_use_default_hour_cost.description: Indicates whether default hourly cost should be used.

financial_default_hour_rate_source.description: Default source for hourly rate calculations.
